content: our december makers kit is just perfect for this time of year we re calling this one naughty or nice this kit will make 3 hats one red one nice one green one naughty or maybe grinch like one striped naughty and nice find kit here 1 each kit includes 3 balls of cascade pacific bulky yarn 60% acrylic/40% superwash merino wool hard copy of the pattern naughty or nice you ll need us 13 needles 16 and double points 1 https //www darnknitanyway com/shop/c/p/naughty-or-nice-hat---december-makers-x86353911 htm
